adm:managed-object.name: error-log-publisher
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: are reponsible for distributing error log messages from the error logger to a destination.

adm:property.name: java-implementation-class
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
The fully-qualified name of the Java class that provides the
implementation.

adm:property.name: default-severity
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Property to specify the default severity levels for the logger.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Severities fatal-error, severe-warning, and severe-error will be used for the logger.

adm:value.name: all
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Messages of all severity levels will be logged.

adm:value.name: fatal-error
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about fatal errors which may force the server to shut down or operate in a significantly degraded state.

adm:value.name: informational
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about significant events within the server that are not warnings or errors.

adm:value.name: mild-error
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about mild (recoverable) errors encountered during processing.

adm:value.name: mild-warning
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about mild warnings triggered during processing.

adm:value.name: notice
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for the most important informational messages (i.e., information that should almost always be logged but is not associated with a warning or error condition).

adm:value.name: severe-error
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about severe errors encountered during processing.

adm:value.name: severe-warning
adm:value.adm:synopsis: The error log severity that will be used for messages that provide information about severe warnings triggered during processing.

adm:property.name: override-severity
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Property to specify the override severity levels for the logger based on the category of the messages. Each override severity level should include the category and the severity levels to log for that category. (ie. core-server=mild_error,info,mild_warning).

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: All messages with the default severity levels will be logged.
